[Outfit mod. Eren shirt]
D3000000 00000000
009082BC 000000EC
D2000000 00000000
{Change your outfit to wharever you have, after that you will see the change reflected on your character. All the outfit codes posted are unobtainable by normal means.}

[Change last Skill - Adrenaline]
D3000000 00000000
009082D0 0030002C
009118EC 0030002C
D2000000 00000000
{This changes the last ability you have equipped.}
